[X] Review response for accuracy (Ready to Load grouping question):

8 Austin Priest 12/30/2025: This has me kinda confused since is seems to be showing info from Purchase Order records not Delivery Ticket records?

Niccolas Miller 01/06/2026: I was somewhat confused how to notate this, and we may want to clarify how Silverloom records translate to app screens. I marked these as delivery tickets because they correspond to a single GW PO (linked to a DT), not a buyer PO. I think it could also be considered "all open GW POs for the member". We have one-to-one linking between GW POs and DTs.
